mapper.select: select table_name, create_time, engine, table_collation, table_comment from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) order by create_time desc
SELECT COUNT(*) from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database())
select table_name ,create_time , engine, table_collation, table_comment from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name like #{name} order by create_time desc

select '${tableName}' as table_name, column_name, if(is_nullable='NO',true, false) as not_null, data_type as column_type, column_comment as remark, column_key as key_type, extra from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
